pages.title: Beam Cage
pages.text: The <item>Beam Cage/$ is a way of storing <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beams/$ in an item- it acts as a 'battery' for <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beams/$. It can store 2048 each of <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)Energy, Potential, Stability, and Void/$.$(br2)If a <item>beam cage/$ is put in a <item>$(l:essentials:beam/extractor)resonance extractor/$, the <item>$(l:essentials:beam/extractor)resonance extractor/$ will output the entire stored <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beam

<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)/$ at once. The empty <item>beam cage/$ will not be destroyed, and can be extracted by automation.$(br2)<item>$(l:essentials:technomancy/staff)Certain items/$ use the <item>beam cage/$ as a power source when the <item>beam cage/$ is in the offhand slot or in a baubles slot (if the Curios mod is installed).$(br2)

<item>Beam cages/$ can be charged in a <item>Cage Charger/$, which is a block that can hold 1 <item>beam cage/$, and will store any received <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beam/$ in the <item>beam cage/$. <item>$(l:essentials/circuits#reader)Circuits/$ measure the total <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)power/$ stored in the <item>beam cage/$ if applicable. Automation can extract/insert <item>beam cages/$ from the <item>cage charger/$.$(br2)
